title: Got banned and cant submit ticket need help not deserved ban(Hacked)
body:
Hey today I got banned and yesterday I tried to submit a ticket saying some1 changed the email on my account, When I was ingame yesterday some1 logged into my account from another computer so after game I got dced I went online then and tried to change password then I saw the email was changed so I sent ticket about it and for some reason my tickets dident showup under My Tickets in the support section. So today when I tried to log on my acc was perm banned and I need help unlocking it and figure out what happened and why I got banned.

Thank you
BX3 Dove

replies.body: No worries, you can reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to update your account info and get in touch with a Specialist.  We are also available through email via support@riotgames.com.  Hit us up and we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
